name: Reactive Arcane Shield
text: Your arcane shield responds to threats even if you’re caught off guard.
prerequisites: Arcane Shield<sup>APG</sup>, arcane spellcaster, caster level 12th.
benefit: If you are aware of an attack against you that has already been declared and you choose to use the Arcane Shield<sup>APG</sup> feat, the immediate action to activate the feat occurs before the attack roll against you is resolved. In addition, all adjacent allies also gain the feat’s deflection bonus to AC for 1 round.
